column5: MDCO 3510 last if it close 35 or higher it would be highest close since 91018 Options expir may pin this at 35 today likely Who is selling not the smart money Notice the updated top 15 holders list shows that Sarissa Cap Alex Denner added 431k shares and now controls more than 4 mil shares Shorts Dumb money
